author: rappoccio
body:
This is the backport of this request to 620 at Slava's request : 

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/678

This only backports the b-tagging part, not the EGM changes which required a dataformats change.
title: Rappoccio : Backporting Event Interpretation changes to add b-tagging sequence to 620
